headline.main: 4 KEY TOWNS HELD; Bases on Greek Border -- Push Toward Turkey Also Under Way BRITISH ENVOY SEES KING Break Expected Tomorrow -- Sofia Sets Up Air Defenses -- Parliament Hails Pact

lead_paragraph: SOFIA, Bulgaria, Monday, March 3 -- The vanguard of Germany's on-rushing Balkan army, speeding across Bulgaria from bases in Rumania, was reported to have reached the Greek frontier at four points early today.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
